CustomField.description: Job name (MasterLabel) to chain to after all workers complete. Uses CursorJob.run() internally. This is the simplest chaining option - just specify another job name. For class-based chaining, use Chain_To_Class__c instead.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the name of another CursorBatch_Config__mdt job to run after this job completes (e.g., TAP Billing). Leave blank if no chaining is needed.
CustomField.label: Chain To Job
